select sei.id, sei.course_date, sei.start_time, sei.end_time, sei.course_id, sei.content, sei.create_date, ci.name as courseName, ci.address, si.name as staffName, si.images as staffImages, ti.name as tieName, mi.name as majorName from schedule_elective_info sei left join course_info ci on (ci.id = sei.course_id) left join left join staff_info si on (si.id = ci.staff_id) left join tie_info ti on (ti.id = ci.tie_id) left join major_info mi on (mi.id = ci.major_id) where 1 = 1
AND ci.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{scheduleElectiveInfo.courseName},'%')
AND mi.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{scheduleElectiveInfo.majorName},'%')
AND si.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{scheduleElectiveInfo.staffName},'%')
order by sei.create_date desc
